Asana.name: Surya Namaskara
Asana.description: Sun Salutation, a sequence of twelve powerful yoga postures

Asana.name: Chandra Namaskara
Asana.description: Chandra Namaskara, also known as Moon Salutation, is a series of yoga asanas that contrasts the dynamic and heating Sun Salutation by being more cooling and calming, ideal for evening practice or times of relaxation.
